attributes.comment:
As prospective adoptive parents wishing to adopt a baby girl from China, the fee
increase of course would impact our situation. We respectfully submit that you
hold the fees steady so that this doesn't negatively impact others. As is, families
wishing to adopt from China are already having longer and longer wait times and
will need to re-apply for a I-171H. In our case, we will need to pay this fee twice,
and at a higher rate if you raise these fees.
Please take into account that this will impact thousands of potential American
citizens wishing to adopt abroad. We already sacrifice so much to have children,
and raising these already expensive fees will be more of a hardship and
heartache.
Robert and Jenny Gordon
Macon, Georgia
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Robert and Jenny Gordon
